fullText: LuPone and Farrow make for an unexpectedly winning odd couple in Jen Silverman's slender but absorbing two-hander about female friendship and self-discovery.
dtliExcerpt: LuPone and Farrow make for an unexpectedly winning odd couple in Jen Silverman's slender but absorbing two-hander about female friendship and self-discovery.
